reactor.bus.registry

Interface Registration<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of object that is matched by selectors
    V - The type of object that is registered
    All Superinterfaces:
    Pausable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachableRegistration

    public interface Registration<K,V>
extends Pausable
    A Registration represents an object that has been registered with a Registry.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Registration<K,V> cancel()
      Cancel this Registration by removing it from its registry.
      Registration<K,V> cancelAfterUse()
      Cancel this Registration after it has been selected and used.
      V getObject()
      The object that was registered
      Selector<K> getSelector()
      The Selector that was used when the registration was made.
      boolean isCancelAfterUse()
      Whether to cancel this Registration after use or not.
      boolean isCancelled()
      Has this been cancelled?
      boolean isPaused()
      Whether this Registration has been paused or not.
      Registration<K,V> pause()
      Pause this Registration.
      Registration<K,V> resume()
      Unpause this Registration, making it available for selection.

    • Method Detail

      • getSelector

        Selector<K> getSelector()
        The Selector that was used when the registration was made.
        Returns:
        the registration's selector

      • getObject

        V getObject()
        The object that was registered
        Returns:
        the registered object

      • cancelAfterUse

        Registration<K,V> cancelAfterUse()
        Cancel this Registration after it has been selected and used. Dispatcher implementations should respect this value and perform the cancellation.
        Returns:
        this

      • isCancelAfterUse

        boolean isCancelAfterUse()
        Whether to cancel this Registration after use or not.
        Returns:
        true if the registration will be cancelled after use, false otherwise.

      • cancel

        Registration<K,V> cancel()
        Cancel this Registration by removing it from its registry.
        Specified by:
        cancel in interface Pausable
        Returns:
        this

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Has this been cancelled?
        Returns:
        true if this has been cancelled, false otherwise.

      • pause

        Registration<K,V> pause()
        Pause this Registration. This leaves it in its registry but, while it is paused, it will not be eligible for selection.
        Specified by:
        pause in interface Pausable
        Returns:
        this

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()
        Whether this Registration has been paused or not.
        Returns:
        true if currently paused, false otherwise.

      • resume

        Registration<K,V> resume()
        Unpause this Registration, making it available for selection.
        Specified by:
        resume in interface Pausable
        Returns:
        this
